de.payleven.payment

Interface SignatureRequestListener


  • public interface SignatureRequestListener
    Called when signature is required to verify a payment.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSignatureRequested(SignatureResponseHandler signatureHandler)
      When called the customer's signature must be provided in order to confirm the payment.

    • Method Detail

      • onSignatureRequested

        void onSignatureRequested(SignatureResponseHandler signatureHandler)
        When called the customer's signature must be provided in order to confirm the payment. Implementation must use signatureHandler in order to confirm or decline the customer's signature
        Parameters:
        signatureHandler - allows to confirm or decline customer's signature
